ConfigurationAtom.HtmlHeader:
To use Payflow Pro, you must have a PayPal Payflow account. Once you're signed up, enter the required information below to start accepting payments. More info • Configuration Help

Don't have a PayPal Account?
Sign Up Now
You created this information when you signed up for PayPal Payflow Pro. Enter it here to connect your account and allow payments. (Note: This is also your login information for PayPal Manager.)
ConfigurationAtom.Title: Configure PayPal Payflow Pro

AppConfig.Name: PayFlowPro.PARTNER
AppConfig.ContextualDescription: This should be the same partner name that's used when logging into your PayPal Payflow account.

AppConfig.Name: PayFlowPro.VENDOR
AppConfig.ContextualDescription: This is the login name you created when signing up for Payflow.

AppConfig.Name: PayFlowPro.USER
AppConfig.ContextualDescription: PayPal recommends entering a User Login here instead of your Merchant Login. You can set up a User profile in PayPal Manager. This will enhance security and prevent service interruption should you change your Merchant Login password.

AppConfig.Name: PayFlowPro.PWD
AppConfig.ContextualDescription: This is the password you created when signing up for PayPal Payflow.
